body_html:
I'm encountering the same error, when I'm trying to set a very large parameter with value from numpy. E.g.:

loaded_value = .... (8096x8096 numpy ndarray)
 w = tf.Variable(loaded_value, name="w")
...
session = tf.Session(config=config)
init = tf.global_variables_initializer()
session.run(init) # Crashes

Also note that that is 256MB array, no idea what the 2GB is coming from.

body:
I'm encountering the same error, when I'm trying to set a very large parameter with value from numpy. E.g.:
```
loaded_value = .... (8096x8096 numpy ndarray)
 w = tf.Variable(loaded_value, name="w")
...
session = tf.Session(config=config)
init = tf.global_variables_initializer()
session.run(init) # Crashes
````
Also note that that is 256MB array, no idea what the 2GB is coming from.
